Player History
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1986, off Dwayne Henry (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1986, off Dave Rozema (TEX)...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 6/6/1986...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,807,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/17/1988 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,807,143 through salary arbitration...
Drove in 6 runs against Texas on 5/12/1989...
2/2/1990: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,807,143 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/21/1990 with a Pulled Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
10/10/1990: Signed a contract extension with Oakland, $4,000,000 per year, for 3 years.
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 1990...
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/5/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $4,000,000 per year...
